alert.note: Alert for Laurens; Southern Greenville; Southern Spartanburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 4:17PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Laurens, southeastern Greenville and southwestern Spartanburg Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 416 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles west of Laurens, or 8 miles west of Gray Court, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mauldin, Simpsonville, Five Forks, Fountain Inn, Gray Court, Woodruff, Fork Shoals, Princeton and Hickory Tavern. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
